title: Humbo Bumbo Gaming Platform Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Implement a game selection interface showing available games with entry fees and potential winnings
acceptanceCriteria: Display a list or grid of available games
Each game shows its entry fee amount
Each game shows potential winning amount
Users can select a game to play

file_operations.description: Create the game selection page component that displays available games in a grid layout. Each game card shows the game name, entry fee, potential winnings, and a play button. Use the backend interface to fetch game data if needed, or display static game options. Apply vibrant gaming aesthetics with bold typography and energetic colors consistent with the Humbo Bumbo theme.

Create a reusable GameCard component that displays individual game information including name, entry fee, potential winnings, and a call-to-action button. Style with Tailwind CSS using vibrant colors and bold typography to match the gaming theme.
Add route for the GameSelection page and wire it into the main application routing. Ensure the game selection page is accessible from the main navigation.

requirements.summary: Build a betting system where users can place bets from their wallet balance before starting a game
acceptanceCriteria: Users can select bet amount before game starts
Bet amount is deducted from user wallet balance
Users cannot bet more than their available balance
Bet is recorded in backend before game begins

file_operations.description: Create a BetPlacement component that allows users to input or select their bet amount before starting a game. Display the user's current balance, validate that the bet does not exceed available balance, and provide clear feedback. Use React Query to call backend.placeBet() method when bet is confirmed. Style with vibrant colors and clear call-to-action buttons.

Create a custom hook that wraps the backend.placeBet() method using React Query mutation. Handle loading states, errors, and success responses. Invalidate wallet balance query after successful bet placement to refresh the displayed balance.

requirements.summary: Create at least one playable game mechanic with win/lose conditions
acceptanceCriteria: Implement an interactive game that users can play
Game has clear win and lose conditions
Game outcome is determined by gameplay
Game completion triggers result processing

file_operations.description: Create a GamePlay page component that hosts the interactive 2D game. Implement a simple game mechanic (e.g., number guessing, spin-the-wheel, or quick reflex challenge) with clear win and lose conditions. Track game state, handle user interactions, determine outcome based on gameplay logic, and trigger result processing when game completes. Reference the generated background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/game-background.dim_1920x1080.png as the game backdrop.

Create a GameCanvas component that renders the 2D game visuals and handles user input. Implement game logic for win/lose determination. Use vibrant colors and engaging animations to match the Humbo Bumbo gaming theme.
Add route for the GamePlay page and wire it into the application routing. Ensure game page receives necessary parameters (game name, bet amount) from navigation state or route params.

requirements.summary: Implement win/loss resolution that credits winnings to user wallet on victory or records loss
acceptanceCriteria: Winning outcomes credit prize amount to user wallet
Losing outcomes are recorded without crediting funds
Game results are persisted in backend
Users can see updated balance after game completion

file_operations.description: Create a GameResult component that displays the outcome of a game (win or loss), shows the amount won or lost, and displays the updated wallet balance. Use React Query to call backend.resolveBet() method with game name, outcome, and winnings amount. Display celebratory visuals for wins and encouraging messaging for losses. Style with bold typography and energetic colors.

Create a custom hook that wraps the backend.resolveBet() method using React Query mutation. Handle the resolution process, invalidate wallet balance and game history queries after successful resolution to refresh displayed data.
Integrate GameResult component into GamePlay page. When game completes, trigger the useResolveBet hook with appropriate outcome data and display the GameResult component.

requirements.summary: Build a game history view showing past games played with bet amounts, outcomes, and winnings
acceptanceCriteria: Display list of user's past games
Each entry shows game name, bet amount, outcome (win/loss), and amount won or lost
History is paginated or scrollable for many entries
History persists across sessions

file_operations.description: Create a GameHistory page component that displays the user's past game sessions. Use React Query to fetch game history via backend.getGameHistory() method. Display each game entry with game name, bet amount, outcome (win/loss), and winnings or losses. Implement scrollable or paginated list for handling many entries. Style with consistent gaming theme using vibrant colors and clear visual differentiation between wins and losses.

Create a HistoryEntry component that displays a single game history record with game name, bet amount, outcome, and winnings/losses. Use color coding (e.g., green for wins, red for losses) and bold typography to make outcomes clear.
Create a custom hook that wraps the backend.getGameHistory() method using React Query. Handle loading states, errors, and return the game history array.
Add route for the GameHistory page and wire it into the application routing. Ensure it is accessible from main navigation.

requirements.summary: Design a vibrant, exciting gaming interface with a creative visual theme featuring energetic colors, bold typography, and engaging layouts that evoke the thrill of competitive gaming and winning
acceptanceCriteria: Interface uses a cohesive color palette that is energetic and attention-grabbing
Typography is bold and reflects gaming aesthetics
Layout design creates excitement and engagement
Design is applied consistently across all pages

file_operations.description: Define the global design system with vibrant, energetic colors (e.g., electric blues, neon greens, bold purples, bright oranges) for the Humbo Bumbo gaming platform. Set up custom CSS variables for primary, secondary, accent colors, and gaming-specific color schemes. Apply bold, attention-grabbing typography using custom font imports or web-safe bold fonts. Establish consistent spacing, border radius, and animation utilities that create excitement and engagement.

Extend the Tailwind configuration with custom color palette matching the Humbo Bumbo gaming theme. Define custom font families with bold weights, custom spacing scales, and animation utilities. Add gaming-specific design tokens for consistent styling across all components.

Create a Layout component that wraps all pages and provides consistent structure including header with the Humbo Bumbo logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/humbo-bumbo-logo.dim_256x256.png, main navigation, and footer. Apply the vibrant gaming theme throughout with energetic colors and bold typography. Include navigation links to game selection, wallet/balance view, and game history.
Wrap all routes with the Layout component to ensure consistent design system application across all pages. Ensure the logo and navigation are present on every page.

requirements.summary: Render generated logo and game background images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are referenced correctly in frontend code
Logo appears in appropriate locations (header, favicon, etc.)
Background images enhance visual appeal of game interface

file_operations.description: Reference the generated logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/humbo-bumbo-logo.dim_256x256.png in the header section of the Layout component. Ensure the logo is displayed prominently and consistently across all pages.

Reference the generated game background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/game-background.dim_1920x1080.png as the backdrop for the game play area. Apply it as a background image to enhance the visual appeal and excitement of the gaming experience.

Update the favicon link to reference the generated logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/humbo-bumbo-logo.dim_256x256.png (or create an .ico version if needed) so the logo appears in browser tabs.
